Mackerel.name: Mackerel
Mackerel.desc: A small, silvery fish with dark blue stripes along its back.

Sardine.name: Sardine
Sardine.desc: A tiny, oily fish with shimmering silver scales.

Sea Bass.name: Sea Bass
Sea Bass.desc: A sleek predatory fish with sharp spines along its dorsal fin.

Shrimp.name: Shrimp
Shrimp.desc: A small translucent crustacean with a curved body and long antennae.

Haddock.name: Haddock
Haddock.desc: A white fish with a distinctive dark spot above its pectoral fin.

Mullet.name: Mullet
Mullet.desc: A bottom-feeder with a thick-lipped mouth and rounded body.

Sea Star.name: Sea Star
Sea Star.desc: A spiky creature with five vibrant arms radiating from its center.

Cod.name: Cod
Cod.desc: A large white fish with spotted patterns and three dorsal fins.

Crab.name: Crab
Crab.desc: A hard-shelled crustacean with eight legs and powerful claws.

Salmon.name: Salmon
Salmon.desc: A pink-hued fish with spots and a powerful muscular build.

Amberjack.name: Amberjack
Amberjack.desc: A sleek fish with golden horizontal stripes along its body.

Clownfish.name: Clownfish
Clownfish.desc: A vibrant orange fish with bold white and black stripes.

Bluefin Tuna.name: Bluefin Tuna
Bluefin Tuna.desc: A massive fish with deep blue coloring and a torpedo-shaped body.

Pufferfish.name: Pufferfish
Pufferfish.desc: A round fish covered in sharp spines that inflates when threatened.

Octopus.name: Octopus
Octopus.desc: A soft-bodied creature with eight flexible tentacles and spots.

Giant Trevally.name: Giant Trevally
Giant Trevally.desc: A powerful fish with a sleek metallic body and large fins.

Great White Shark.name: Great White Shark
Great White Shark.desc: A massive predator with grey coloring and a distinctive white belly.

Flying Fish.name: Flying Fish
Flying Fish.desc: A streamlined fish with enlarged pectoral fins like wings.

Sea Turtle.name: Sea Turtle
Sea Turtle.desc: An ancient reptile with a hard shell and four flippers.

Barracuda.name: Barracuda
Barracuda.desc: A sleek predator with sharp teeth and a silvery streamlined body.

Colossal Squid.name: Colossal Squid
Colossal Squid.desc: A massive deep-sea creature with glowing eyes and enormous tentacles.

Orca.name: Orca
Orca.desc: A massive black and white marine mammal with a distinctive white eye patch.

Blue Whale.name: Blue Whale
Blue Whale.desc: An enormous blue-grey creature, the largest animal to exist.

Meme Fish.name: Meme Fish
Meme Fish.desc: A peculiar creature with an unusual appearance born from internet culture.
